list.title: Lightning Fast Engine
list.desc: Powered by our exclusive 'Banana-Flow' architecture. Generate 4 images in the time it takes others to load the interface.

list.title: Text That Is Actually Readable
list.desc: Finally, an AI that can spell. Generate logos, book covers, and posters with perfect typography rendering.

list.title: Style Consistency (LoRA)
list.desc: Keep your characters and art styles consistent across multiple generations. Perfect for comic books and game assets.

list.title: Private & Secure
list.desc: Your prompts and generated images are private by default. We do not use your private data to train our public models.

list.review: I switched from Midjourney because Nano Banana actually listens to my prompts. The workflow is 10x faster.
list.author: Sarah Jenkins

list.review: The text rendering capability is insane. I designed my entire brand identity in 20 minutes.
list.author: Mike Chen

list.review: Finally, a tool that offers consistent character styles. My webcomic production has never been smoother.
list.author: Elena Rodriguez

items.q: Is Nano Banana free to use?
items.a: Yes! We provide a generous daily free quota that refreshes every 24 hours. No credit card required to start.

items.q: Do I own the images I generate?
items.a: Absolutely. You own 100% of the commercial rights to any image you generate on our platform.

items.q: How is this different from Flux or Midjourney?
items.a: Nano Banana is optimized for speed and control. We offer a web-based interface (no Discord required) and specific tools for consistency and text.

items.q: Can I use it on my phone?
items.a: Yes, our website is fully responsive and works perfectly on mobile devices.
